The method set the number of pre-sets for the game and prefill the puzzle with that ammount

When the button is pressed, increase its value by 1 untill it reach the gridSize When it reach the gridSize return to value 0

When button is pressed, check what does it say and change the value of ShowProblems accordingly

When button is pressed it restores the grid to its initial state

The method calls the function saveGame() of the FutoshikiPuzzle
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class SolveListener
When button is pressed, it run solve() function of current game and prints message according to result

solve() - Method in class FutoshikiPuzzle
Recursive method that attemps to solve the current state of FutoshikiPuzzle by finding first empty field, increase its value, and run itself again, if it comes back false, increase value again and so on.
